Title: TimeSheet Reporting Silverlight
Description:
TimeSheet Reporting application in Silver light.
Contains a data grid containing combo boxes bound to different data sources like Members and Projects
The Grid is bound to a different data source called Efforts
HomeWiki:
TimeSheet Reporting Project V1 in Silverlight.

Frontend is designed using Silverlight.
Back end is SQL Server.
The application uses Domain Services

Database contains three tables - Member, Project and Effort
Effort table contains a foreign key MemberId and ProjectId

Kindly note that you need to change the connection string appropriately in web.config to set up DB connection

I have uploaded the SQL script to create the database.
Also I have uploaded a document for IIS Settings and adding ASPNET user to the database.
